Class CleanupConfiguration

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Cleanup
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Configuration settings for database cleanup and maintenance operations. Controls retention policies, scheduling, and optimization behaviors.

public class CleanupConfiguration

Constructors

CleanupConfiguration()

Initializes a new instance of the CleanupConfiguration class with default values.

public CleanupConfiguration()

Properties

ArticleRetentionDays

Gets or sets the number of days to retain articles before deletion. Articles older than this value are candidates for cleanup.

public int ArticleRetentionDays { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Number of days. Default is 30. Zero or negative values disable article cleanup.

AutoCleanupEnabled

Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic cleanup is enabled. When disabled, manual cleanup must be triggered explicitly.

public bool AutoCleanupEnabled { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

true to enable automatic cleanup; otherwise, false. Default is true.

CleanupDayOfWeek

Gets or sets the day of week when weekly cleanup should run. Only applies if cleanup frequency is weekly.

public DayOfWeek CleanupDayOfWeek { get; set; }

Property Value

DayOfWeek

DayOfWeek enum value. Default is Sunday.

CleanupHourOfDay

Gets or sets the hour of day (0-23) when automatic cleanup should run.

public int CleanupHourOfDay { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Hour in 24-hour format. Default is 2 (2:00 AM).

ImageCacheRetentionDays

Gets or sets the number of days to retain cached images.

public int ImageCacheRetentionDays { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Number of days. Default is 30.

KeepFavorites

Gets or sets a value indicating whether favorite articles should be preserved regardless of retention period.

public bool KeepFavorites { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

true to keep favorite articles; otherwise, false. Default is true.

KeepUnread

Gets or sets a value indicating whether unread articles should be preserved regardless of retention period.

public bool KeepUnread { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

true to keep unread articles; otherwise, false. Default is true.

MaxImageCacheSizeMB

Gets or sets the maximum size of the image cache in megabytes. When exceeded, oldest images are removed until under this limit.

public int MaxImageCacheSizeMB { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Maximum size in MB. Default is 500.

RebuildIndexesAfterCleanup

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to rebuild indexes after cleanup.

public bool RebuildIndexesAfterCleanup { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

true to rebuild indexes; otherwise, false. Default is false.

VacuumAfterCleanup

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to perform VACUUM operation after cleanup to reclaim storage space.

public bool VacuumAfterCleanup { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

true to vacuum after cleanup; otherwise, false. Default is true.

Methods

Clone()

Creates a deep copy of this configuration instance.

public CleanupConfiguration Clone()

Returns

CleanupConfiguration

A new CleanupConfiguration instance with identical values.

IsValid()

Validates the configuration settings.

public bool IsValid()

Returns

bool

True if configuration is valid; otherwise, false.

ToString()

Gets a summary of the current configuration for logging purposes.

public override string ToString()

String representation of key configuration values.
